Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class FavorTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.FavorTile
public class FavorTile
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents a FavorTile which can be found on the FaithTrack. It has an amount of victory points and may be active.

  • Constructor Details

    • FavorTile

      public FavorTile​(int victoryPoints, boolean active, int start, int end)
      Constructor FavorTile creates a new FavorTile instance.
      Parameters:
      victoryPoints - is the amount of Victory Points this FavorTile has.
      active - is the state of the FavorTile.
      start - is where the vatican report section starts, might be null.
      end - is where the vatican report section ends, might be null.

  • Method Details

    • setVictoryPoints

      public void setVictoryPoints​(int victoryPoints)
      This method sets the FavorTile's victory points.
      Parameters:
      victoryPoints - the new amount of victory points contained in the FavorTile.
